Sentence: Jürgen Tesman and Hedda Tesman -LRB-nee Hedda Gabler-RRB- are newlyweds
Eventually, Hedda gets Tesman to leave, and she (Hedda) convinces Mrs
He (Brack) leaves, and Tesman tells Hedda that they will have to cut back on their expenses

Hedda tells Brack how bored she (Hedda) was on her (Hedda) honeymoon and how she (Hedda) has no special feeling for the house Tesman has gone to great lengths to buy for her (Hedda), under the false impression that she (Hedda) desperately wanted to live there
Ejlert Lövborg arrives and talks in earnest with Hedda while Tesman and Brack drink in the other room
Brack arrives and tells Hedda that Tesman left before Ejlert got into real trouble, that indeed he (Brack) has been arrested
